name: X-Men (1992)
description:
X-Men (1992) is an action-arcade game developed by Konami Digital Entertainment. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by Konami. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
X-Men (1992) is available on Commodore / Amiga.
Will Meugniot produced the game. It was scored by Junya Nakano, Shuki Levy and Yuji Takenouchi.
